storyInfo: Thanks to timely reinforcements from other Rhodes Islanders, Closure sets up signal towers, restoring communications. Meanwhile, the Exemplars and Gododdin's forces successfully defend the town of Gibsonham.

attributes.content: I think something's wrong with the diffractometer's sensor.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Nothing's wrong with it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You see, Viktor? I'm getting the same results.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: It's not always the equipment's fault that you're not getting valid data. The data itself may exceed the scope.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Originium reaction metrics are above the default limit.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: They're coming, guys. We have three minutes.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Viktor is the youngest of us. If nothing else, we should try to get him out...
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Who did you think was the reason that I signed up for the Londinium operation?
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Never could just do as you're told, could you?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: How are you doing over there, Closure?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Still alive. I've got my drones, and they're loaded with—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I think I hear the sound of drones crashing.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: They used to be your babies.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Haha—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You knew it when you ordered the Self-Salvation Corps to pull out, didn't you? That was the last chance to escape.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: The Originium activity data is incomplete.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I need data... from all of you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Amiya's not here, so you're my captain, Closure.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: We all talked to Amiya before we came to Londinium.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Stop a war, and save both the Victorians and the Sarkaz? With just the few of us? That's next to impossible.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: But I chose to trust all of you. Trust in the dream of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: There isn't a single Rhodes Island operator who doesn't want to see the day when there is a cure for Oripathy, when everybody's living a better life. Doesn't that sound ridiculous to most folks?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: My only regret about dying here... is that I won't get to see that day.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Did you get my data, Yvres?
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Yup. Just sent the newest batch of data over, Captain.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Oh, and I'm not that selfless, so don't forget to put my name in when you publish your paper.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: ...Will do.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: 'Communication failure detected. Signal lost imminent.'
'Importing energy fluctuation data. Initializing automatic analysis module.'
'Catastrophe scale confirmed. Developing prediction model on Originium induced environmental changes for the next 24 hours...'
'Bzzzz—Captain, shield... damaged...'
'They're... about to...'
'Hang in there... Yvres... moving towards your position— Bzzzz'
'Bzzzz—'
'Make it happen, Closure.'
I will.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The engineer's eyes are glued to the screen in front of her.
Faster. Faster. If they fail to compile the Originium activity data, then all the squad's efforts would be for naught.
The din of war approaches.
Only a few drones remain. She can feel the enemy's cold, freezing breath.
'...Model successfully compiled.'
'Outputting safe zone locations—'
YES!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: All that's left is the signal tower—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...Vampire. Traitor.
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: This war will go on, and you will feed it.
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Yikes!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: My drone—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The Sudaram's blade slices the hovering drone, sending it crashing to the ground.
That was her last combat drone.
Get out of the way!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Your Arts are weak and pathetic.
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: How could such a frail Vampire exist?
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Searing pain erupts and Closure feels an entire side of her body go numb.
The breath of decay invades her.
Closure can barely hold onto the signal tower. With great effort, she plants the complex equipment into the ground to lean on.
'Insufficient signal strength. Strong interference detected. Unable to broadcast safe zone location.
'Please follow the equipment manual—'
I know! Shut up!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What kind of Vampire are you, Closure? Close those wounds! Hang in there, just a little longer...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just get this thing up right—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: ...Sleeping in the corridors again? You'll catch a cold.
Rhodes Island's basic functions are online. I think she's ready for a grand voyage.
Thank you, Chief Engineer. You've delivered your promise.
If you want to leave this ship and go back to Kazdel... Right, you told me before. You're not interested in that place.
But at least promise me you won't call yourself a talentless Vampire anymore.
You're the most talented person I've ever known, Closure. You're just different from other Vampires.
So here's my offer: as long as you still want to see the vast and unexplored parts of this land, we'll always be each other's companion.

attributes.content: (I can't... I won't...)
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (Won't let... everyone down...)
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (...And myself.)
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure can feel the Sudaram's cold grip close in around her neck.
War has finally claimed her.
Closure!
Who...?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A survivor?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Signal... there's a signal...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A Rhodes Island signal.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Grab my hand, Closure!
...Dobermann?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Can you stand?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Fang...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: A dagger pierces the Sudaram's chest, causing a massive burst of energy.
Sorry I'm late.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Misery gave us the location.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: More are coming.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Almost got it! Cover me!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Keep them away!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What is our mission? When Closure first joined Rhodes Island, then known as Babel, she asked many operators this question.
She got a different answer every time.
Some dreams are big. Others, less so.
Some gave details. Others mumbled, scratched their heads, and gave an abashed smile.
But there comes a time when they all have the same expression.
And a time when they all make the same choice.
Almost there... this is the last one.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: 'Core module online. Communications restored.'
We're coming, Closure! Hang in there!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We sent your location to the Exemplars! Help is on the way!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Finally—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure? Closure! Are you okay—
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Keep your distance. Cover the artilleries and crossbowmen.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The appearance of the Nachzehrers is closely linked to Catastrophes. Do not fear their witchcraft. However bizarre it is, it's still Arts!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Remember how we marched through a Catastrophe—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We survived a Catastrophe. We'll survive the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...Bagpipe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Aye? I'm here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Duke of Gododdin spoke the truth. Tempest Platoon is under the direct authority of Parliament.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We have an obligation to answer Parliament's call.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's a more legitimate cause for action than the duke's invitation.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not to mention that by accepting his invitation, you, Robben, and everyone who came with us because they had no choice... will have proper identities.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Identity? Did you forget, captain? I'm retired anyways.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Besides, in that standoff with the duke earlier, ye didn't hesitate to put yer shield in front of Siege.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...True.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Word is Siege's carryin' the Sighs of Kings... have ye seen it before, Captain?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I have.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Siege was right. It's just a piece of metal that happens to mean something to some people.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Troops approaching on our flank.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: No ID code, but I recognize them. They're the Duke of Gododdin's men.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: They've engaged the Sarkaz... and covered one of our squads just now.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If that's Gododdin's way of showing friendship, then we'll show him the same in return.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Attention Exemplars! Stand with the soldiers of Gododdin!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not one step backward, until the last foe is vanquished!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The ship has reached cruising speed, sir. We're out of danger for now.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The Sarkaz's witchcraft is most peculiar indeed. Better to fake a moment of vulnerability than to have them constantly harassing our rear.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The leader of the Nachzehrers has not been sighted, nor any other known powerful Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: I suppose they don't see Gododdin as nearly the threat that Windermere or Wellington are.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I could call that a relief.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The Sighs of Kings has not left Gibsonham, sir. Should we move on to the next phase?
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: What do you think of them?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: More of a challenge than expected. Alexandrina's forces are growing, and they are more organized and effective than we thought...
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean as an adversary.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The Exemplars... like you said, they look the part.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: And they've worked well enough with the troops that we left behind.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Rita is with them, and looks more like the legendary White Wolf than her father did. And Windermere isn't quite as weak as the intel had her.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Maybe it's not such a joke after all, that those kids could become the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Do you intend to abandon the plan for us to escort the Realmblade, then?
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Abandon! Such a strong word.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: It is the future that Gododdin values. Alexandrina, the Sighs of Kings, the Exemplars, even Rhodes Island... perhaps we'll cross paths again on our way to the future.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Our tanks are fighting the last pocket of Sarkaz on the east side of town.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We've successfully defended Gibsonham. It will serve as a supply point on the way to Silverrock Bluffs. However...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The terrain has changed.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The environment around Londinium is constantly changing because of Amnannam's influence. Fissures, cliffs, and rapids that should not have been there are emerging everywhere.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Silverrock Bluffs is almost constantly under severe Catastrophe. It's hard to say where our foot will land when we put it forward.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I wouldn't have believed this was our Londinium if I had anything less than absolute faith in Rhodes Island's data.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The sun on the meadow is summery warm♪♫Filling our home with euphoria♬♪...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: After this war, we might have to change our national anthem's lyrics.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Is this time to be havin' a laugh?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You wanted to say 'we'll think about it after we take it back,' didn't you?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But even if we really went back... would our home ever return to the way it was?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That's why we're not just going to win the war.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We're not going to let the Sarkaz destroy Londinium in the war.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We'll overcome the storm ahead.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And we won't abandon the home that the storm has ravaged.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Feist told me his squad picked up more distress signals nearby. There may be more lives saved yet.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The areas where fighting occurred with the Nachzehrers will need to be cleaned up. Rhodes Island operators will provide the usual assistance.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I want the Exemplars to work with them on these post combat affairs.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Establish supply lines, rescue and transfer the injured, and rally those who want to join us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The troops who returned from the front line have assembled.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Counting in the Gododdin soldiers who had their IDs wiped, the Exemplars have far exceeded the scale of a regiment.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: They want to join us?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I met with their officers. They said the Duke of Gododdin left before they could board the transports.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Preliminary screening indicates that all of them are Infected.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Sounds familiar, eh?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Duke of Gododdin left his Infected soldiers behind, just like the other dukes?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Or maybe...?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Or maybe, he intentionally picked a bunch of soldiers who had unfortunately gotten Infected, and sent them over to us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I suspect he has ulterior motives.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The performance of those Infected troops indicates that they're different from those we've seen before. I wouldn't call them stragglers.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If Gododdin's intention is to keep an eye on us, then we should probably try to lose these people, or at least separate them tactically...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You know the dukes better than I, Delphine. There's a very good chance that you're right.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But right now, there's nothing we need more than unity.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If even the Exemplars chose which parts of Victoria they united...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What would happen to the future that we dream of?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Gododdin very likely knew that we couldn't reject those men. That's why he let us leave so easily.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Then we need to be ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is not the first challenge we've had to overcome, nor will it be the last.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sarkaz. Amnannam. Caster. The dukes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's not just one storm that the Exemplars will have to weather.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll let Lieutenant Shearer know.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: To be honest, everyone's happy to get some new blood.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Plus, they're all Infected.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If it's really true that Gododdin has not abandoned them... that, in itself, is worth celebrating.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Perhaps, the unity that once seemed impossible is actually within reach.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's a miracle to run into people like you.
attributes.name: Pained Refugee

attributes.content: We're not the miracle, ma'am.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: You are, all of you, for being strong until the very end.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Thank you so much, regardless.
attributes.name: Pained Refugee

attributes.content: I can still move. Let me help you with the others.
attributes.name: Pained Refugee

attributes.content: This way, you can get some rest... you're not much older than my own child, now that I get a better look at you.
attributes.name: Pained Refugee

attributes.content: We have about ten minutes of rest before we head to the next location.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: ...Closure?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: A little more time...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There's not much room for improvement on that Arts Unit you're holding.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Even Raidian and Mechanist could hardly do better.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Conditions will only get worse from here. The better I do, the safer you guys will be.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Rescue work around Gibsonham is complete. Next, we'll be going to... where your squad's signal was lost.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We'll find them, alive or... otherwise.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Even if they're buried in the sand, or Originium... there will be traces.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: We'll find them and bring them home.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I know how I feel, but Fang... I want to hear your thoughts, too.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Is it regrettable for a Rhodes Island operator to die in a war between the Sarkaz and the Victorians, when they have nothing to do with either side of the war?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Any sacrifice is regrettable.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: After Ace died, Beagle cried for many nights with his shield in her arms.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Why him? Why there? Why then?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I get that feeling too. Every single time.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But what I really want to know is... how did the people who sacrificed feel?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hm... I'm sure they have their own regrets.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: We're none of us saints. That's why we fear death. That's why you feel pain over your decision.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: But I have no regrets about participating in this operation.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: If not for Lava, Hibiscus, or our other Sarkaz friends, then at least for the people here, even though I don't know any of them.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: It was a Catastrophe that brought me from Columbia to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: That Catastrophe taught me one thing: that suffering does not discriminate.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: I came here today because I know that you will come when my home needs help, when the people I care about need help.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We'll be there.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: You know something? I've been addicted to the web since a very young age, because that's the only place I knew without segregation.
The other Vampire children and I, Vampires and other Sarkaz, Sarkaz and everyone else, Catastrophe, nations, class, disease.
It was Theresa who took me from the confines of my home and showed me another possibility.
A ship that sails the waves of disaster, rescues those who are suffering, and fosters companionships beyond personal interest.
But the road that Rhodes Island has traveled thus far is very real.
I'll continue to analyze the anomalies caused by Amnannam. I also want to hear your answer to my question. Kal'tsit's and the Doctor's, too.
This data belongs to Yvres, to Balin, to Viktor, to Rhodes Island... one day, it may belong to everyone.
